Fresh, Flavorful, and Just a Click Away

Enjoy the best BBQ and oysters on Johns Island! We've got entertainment for the whole family. 20+ TVs, 2 bars, and an arcade for the kids! Come on out and have a great time!

order Reservations 
We Look Forward To Welcoming You

Welcome to Blu Smoke Pit! Your new, go-to BBQ spot on Johns Island. 2 bars (inside and outside)  20+ TVs, beautiful covered patio, plenty of seating, arcade games, etc. Fun for all ages. Bring the family down and enjoy some delicious smoked BBQ!
book a table 
Groups & Parties

Celebrate In Style At Blu Smoke Pit

Whether you're planning an intimate gathering, a lively birthday bash, or a corporate event, our upscale setting and expertly crafted menu provide the perfect backdrop for any occasion.
Book a party Catering 
Let Us Tailor A Menu That Suits Your Needs

Elevate your next gathering with the fresh, bold flavors of Blu Smoke Pit. Our catering menu features expertly crafted sushi, premium seafood dishes, and signature flavors that bring elegance and excitement to any event.
catering Skip Photo Gallery 
We are hiring

Join the Blu Smoke Pit Team

Are you passionate about fresh seafood, expertly crafted sushi, and top-notch hospitality? Blu Smoke Pit is looking for talented individuals to join our team!
